usa: The St. Valentine's Day Massacre became one of the most infamous slaying between rival gangs of the Prohibition era; resulting in the deaths of 7.<sup id="cite_ref-114" class="reference">[114]</sup>
Wall Street Crash of 1929: The Dow Jones Industrial Average plummeted a record 68 points.[115]
The Museum of Modern Art opened to the public in New York City.<sup id="cite_ref-116" class="reference">[116]</sup>
American Samoa officially became a United States territory.<sup id="cite_ref-117" class="reference">[117]</sup>
